name: AfterLyte
description:
This is a rouge like game that i made with my friend Jesper for a school project

You get to select between a melee and a range player. You progress by killing and getting to the stairs in each level to get to the next level, as you kill enemies you pick up coins and crystals that you will be able to use on chests through the dungeon and getting stronger (the crystals increase your stats, you press 1 one in game to see your stats and 2 to see your coins).

After level 3 you will be able to find the boss room that contains a toombstone that spawns enemies. To proceed you will need to destroy the toombstone. 

As you proceed thorugh the levels you get stronger, and the enemies increase in numbers and their strenght.

My plan is to work on this project some more on my freetime and upload a bugfix update soon :)
